Text: Strange how the DoD seems to have tabs on this torrent - thanks uploader
This is hard stuff to watch.  Despite that, everybody should watch it.

Watching this was disturbingly awakening. I tried to get others to watch but suffice to say people are afraid of having their compassion stimulated for it may ruin their appetite. Its seems ignorance is a defense mechanism against positive change.

Thanks, this documentary is just terrible, the look in the fox's eyes as its skin is ripped off it while its alive is stuck in my head. The people that do this deserve to be tortured. I'm not a vegetarian, but this has made my conscience so heavy :(
I feel ashamed, that I'm a human. I will never have kids, so they add to this demand of animal meat. Makes me rethink everything :(
JawDroop that fox's picture will haunt me forever. Fuck all Chinese :((

If animals weren't meant to be eaten, why do they taste so nice?

Gonna have a big fry up now, vegetarians are fags!

And for everybody liking this and hating other people doing what you just witness please watch documentary Kymatica so you understand what is repeatingly causing all shit in this experience you call life and understand once and for all what really needs to be changed.
I have been seeding for almost a month now and encourage others to do the same! If you want others to see it, it's one of the easiest ways to make that happen.
